This module contains misc. functions for wAuto.

Procs

proc clipGet(allowFiles = false): string {....raises: [Exception],
    tags: [RootEffect], forbids: [].}
Retrieves text from the clipboard. When allowFiles is true and multiple selecting file/dir are stored in the clipboard, the filename/dirname are returned as texts separated by @LF. 
proc clipPut(text: string) {....raises: [wDataObjectError, Exception],
                             tags: [RootEffect], forbids: [].}
Writes text to the clipboard. An empty string "" will empty the clipboard. 
proc isAdmin(): bool {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Checks if the current user has full administrator privileges. 
proc requireAdmin(raiseError = true) {....raises: [OSError], tags: [ReadIOEffect],
                                       forbids: [].}
Elevate the current process during runtime by restarting it. Raise an error if the user cancel it if raiseError is true.

Made with Nim.
